item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 19, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. An artist who trained rats to trade in foreign-exchange markets (71 points | 16 comments)
2. Kowloon Walled City: Heterotopia in a Space of Disappearance (2013) (98 points | 40 comments)
3. Blackmagic Debuts $30K 3D Camera for Capturing Video for Vision Pro (119 points | 103 comments)
4. Alignment faking in large language models (170 points | 135 comments)
5. Solaar is a Linux manager for many Logitech keyboards, mice, and other devices (551 points | 224 comments)
6. Developing Developers (2015) (124 points | 62 comments)
7. Botan: Crypto and TLS for Modern C++ (3 points | discuss)
8. Markov Keyboard: keyboard layout that changes by Markov frequency (2019) (141 points | 74 comments)
9. Borrow Checking, RC, GC, and Eleven Other Memory Safety Approaches (114 points | 63 comments)
10. Nullboard: Kanban board in a single HTML file (4 points | discuss)
11. Piccolo OS, a Small Multitasking OS for the Raspberry Pi Pico (153 points | 23 comments)
12. Firenvim – Turn the browser into a Neovim client (130 points | 24 comments)
13. Show HN: Postgres as a VectorDB GUI (135 points | 17 comments)
14. ISO 8583: The language of credit cards (346 points | 65 comments)
15. Our brains create mental "chapters" with new event segmentation study (141 points | 17 comments)

17. Java in the Small (266 points | 214 comments)
18. trofaf – super simple live static blog generator in Go (4 points | discuss)
19. Santa Prefers Wealthy Sick Children (2023) (59 points | 19 comments)
20. Genesis – a generative physics engine for general-purpose robotics (130 points | 26 comments)
21. Classical sorting algorithms as a model of morphogenesis (2023) (150 points | 63 comments)
22. The RAM Myth (147 points | 118 comments)
23. Apple Watch with Android (206 points | 124 comments)
24. In Defense of Y'All (115 points | 230 comments)
25. Amazon workers to strike at multiple US warehouses during busy holiday season (256 points | 234 comments)
26. Error Stacking in Rust (111 points | 55 comments)
27. Updates to H-1B (390 points | 1107 comments)
28. Launch HN: Innate (YC F24) – Home robots as easy to program as AI agents (150 points | 63 comments)
29. Torpedo juice: Legendary, illegal WWII liquor drunk in Alaska and the world (75 points | 45 comments)
30. Exposing the Clearingstelle Urheberrecht Im Internet (CUII) (128 points | 24 comments)
